entry.content:
I'm Father, IT Ops Engineer and Hiker :)

I've been also working as Project Manager, Scrum Master, Karaoke Game Producer (long story).

I'm delivering tools and support for customers. Detailed profile can be found on LinkedIn.

Tools

Atlassian: JIRA, Confluence, Bitbucket, Crowd | Cloud and On-Prem

DevOps: Jenkins, SonarQube, Artifactory, Klockwork

Other: Git, Selenium, SVN

Languages: Natural (Polish, English, German); Programming (basics: Python, Bash)

Projects

I was taking different roles on projects listed here.

Events

Speaker

topic: Commercial OpenStreetMap implementation Presentation

Organization

Co-founder

Monthly event for JavaScript developers community around Warsaw.

Main page: WarsawJS, Social media: Meetup, Facebook
